thread.title: Y. Jordan

author: Y. Jordan
title: Y. Jordan
text:
A sincere "thank you" to ZipRecruiter for creating a streamlined platform, allowing me to integrate with my Applicant Tracking System and business email.
Hiring new employees is a difficult task without the proper resources and organizational systems to enhance efficiency. When receiving high volumes of resumes, ZipRecruiter does the hard work of automating posts on multiple social media sites, without you having to post each ad individually. Additionally, the simplicity of its SAAS platform can operate as its own Applicant Tracking System. Additionally, you can browse thousands of resumes from across the internet, all on one site. Overall, ZipRecruiter saved me time, energy, and my budget. I will be back for more soon!
Sincerely,
Y.J.
